text:
Hi there! I am looking to create a trigger action to a button that will open a chat bot on a landing page. I understand this requires custom code. My questions are:

1. Is there a general js code that can be applied to the button?
2. Where can this code be applied?
Thank you for your time!

Here is how you can add your javascript to the header or footer:
<https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/website-pages/add-code-to-the-head-or-footer-html-of-HubSpot-content>

Thank you <@U0572Q18XLG>! We already have the bot set up and many landing pages. You can see the "Learn More" button is placed in the Hero Image in the screen shot attached.

I'd like to set up so when the Learn More button is clicked, the chat bot is launched. The code you shared with me, can that be pasted in the Landing Page HTML head? But how do I had the code that specifies the Learn More button?
